name: 張裕煦
objective: 本課程討論，利用儀器分析工作之理論，儀器之原理，構造操作等。包括光譜學基礎，AA, ICP-AES、UV-Vis，FT-IR，XPS/Auger electron spectroscopy，SEM/AFM，TGA/DTA/DSC 等儀器之探討。
schedule:
1-2 Chap. 0 and Chap.1  Introduction
2-3 Chap. 6  An introduction to spectrometric methods
3-4 Chap. 8  An introduction to optical atomic spectrometry
5-6 Chap. 9  Atomic absorption and atomic fluorescence spectrometry
6-7 Chap. 10 Atomic emission spectrometry
8 Midterm exam
9-10 Chap. 14 Applications of UV/Vis absorption spectrometry
10-11 Chap. 16 An introduction to infrared spectrometry
12-13 Chap. 17 Applications of infrared spectrometry
14-15 Chap. 20 Surface characterization by spectroscopy & microscopy
16-17 Chap. 31 Thermal methods
18  Final exam
scorePolicy:
The final grade will be determined by:
50% midterm + 50% final exam + attendance
materials: Principles of Instrumental Analysis –Cengage Learning; 7th edition; Skoog, Holler, Crouch
consultation: 每次上課結束後，或直接至辦公室與老師討論或 email: yhchang@ntut.edu.tw
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG6：潔淨水與衛生（Clean Water and Sanitation）
remarks: 這門課學習要求嚴謹，非爽課，選修前須斟酌。
